mean_en: the unfair difference between groups of people in society, when some have more wealth, status or opportunities than others
sentence: There is an inequality in family status between cats, dogs and people.
sentence_trans: 猫、狗和人的家庭地位是不平等的。
word_etyma: in不 + equal平等 + ity表名词，指具备某种性质 → inequality不平等；不同
